select u.nick_name nickName, s.store_name storeName, r.review_content reviewContent, r.reg_date regDate, (select count(*) from tb_like l where l.store_review_no = r.review_no) as likeCount, r.recomment reComment, r.status status, r.review_no reviewNo from tb_review r join tb_user u on r.user_no = u.user_no join tb_store s on r.store_no = s.store_no
AND u.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND s.store_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by r.review_no desc
LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
